Label.en: The contrast in lighting is the key thing to notice in this painting
Label.fr: La lumière contrastée est la chose clée à remarquer dans ce tableau
Label.es: The contrast in lighting is the key thing to notice in this painting
Label.zh: The contrast in lighting is the key thing to notice in this painting

Label.en: Look how dark everything is, except the heavenly light of the woman!
Label.fr: Tout est sombre, sauf la lumière céleste qui illumine la femme !
Label.es: Look how dark everything is, except the heavenly light of the woman!
Label.zh: Look how dark everything is, except the heavenly light of the woman!

Label.en: And the crisp, clear halo shines above all, illuminating the water..
Label.fr: Et le halo très net au-dessus d'elle, qui illumine l'eau..
Label.es: And the crisp, clear halo shines above all, illuminating the water..
Label.zh: And the crisp, clear halo shines above all, illuminating the water..

Label.en: Her robes and body seem to be disappearing into the water, becoming more blurred
Label.fr: Ses habits et son corps semblent disparaître dans l'eau, en s'estompant
Label.es: Her robes and body seem to be disappearing into the water, becoming more blurred
Label.zh: Her robes and body seem to be disappearing into the water, becoming more blurred

Label.en: But the halo alone is sharp and clear...
Label.fr: Le halo seul reste clair et précis...
Label.es: But the halo alone is sharp and clear...
Label.zh: But the halo alone is sharp and clear...

Label.en: It could be that her mortal body is vanishing, but her Christian spirit triumphs over death
Label.fr: Il est possible que son enveloppe temporelle s'évanouisse, mais que son âme triomphe de la mort
Label.es: It could be that her mortal body is vanishing, but her Christian spirit triumphs over death
Label.zh: It could be that her mortal body is vanishing, but her Christian spirit triumphs over death

Label.en: Making theories like that is one of my favourite things to do when looking at art!
Label.fr: J'adore élaborer des hypothèses quand je regarde une oeuvre !
Label.es: Making theories like that is one of my favourite things to do when looking at art!
Label.zh: Making theories like that is one of my favourite things to do when looking at art!

Label.en: Well... that's the fun of art! You can make your own theories!
Label.fr: C'est le côté chouette de l'art! On peut élaborer ses propres hypothèses!
Label.es: Well... that's the fun of art! You can make your own theories!
Label.zh: Well... that's the fun of art! You can make your own theories!
